task_name: Scrape LinkedIn Jobs for Intent-Based Leads
context: via Apify for buying intent signals
description: Extract companies posting relevant job openings on LinkedIn to identify buying intent (80-100% enrichment, 20-30 minutes, indicates budget and growth)
buying_intent_signal: Job postings indicate budget, growth, and immediate needs
success_criteria: Companies extracted with job details (title, department, seniority)
Buying intent signals identified (budget, growth, needs)
Final lead list exported with job context

steps.name: Define job search criteria indicating intent
inputs: Job titles indicating your product/service need
Example: 'Data Engineer' for data tools, 'SDR' for sales software
outputs: Search query: 'Data Engineer jobs', 'Marketing Manager positions'
steps.success_criteria: Manual test shows 500+ relevant job postings
steps.responsibility_name: define define job search criteria indicating intent

steps.name: Configure Apify LinkedIn Jobs Scraper
steps.success_criteria: Query entered, filters set, ready to scrape

steps.name: Run Apify Jobs scraper
outputs: 500-2,000 job postings with: job title, company name, posting date, description
steps.success_criteria: Job postings scraped with company information

steps.name: Extract and deduplicate company list
outputs: Unique company list with job context (what role they're hiring)
steps.success_criteria: 100-500 unique companies identified from job postings
steps.responsibility_name: extract extract and deduplicate company list

steps.name: Upload companies to Anymailfinder for enrichment
inputs: Target roles based on job postings

steps.name: Run targeted enrichment for decision-makers
outputs: Enriched emails (80-100% success - high quality source)

steps.name: Export with job posting context
outputs: CSV: company, email, name, title, job_posting_title, buying_intent_signal
steps.success_criteria: All contacts exported with context for personalized outreach

checklist.item: Job search query indicates buying intent for your product
checklist.guide: Example: If selling sales tools, search 'SDR' or 'Sales Manager' jobs
Companies often post multiple jobs, keep unique list
If they're hiring SDRs, target VP Sales or Sales Director
Job posting source = high quality, should achieve 80%+

checklist.item: Buying intent context included in export
checklist.guide: Note what role they're hiring for personalized messaging

buying_intent_signals.perfect_timing: Reach out while they're scaling that function
buying_intent_signals.messaging_advantage: Reference their job posting in outreach for relevance

best_practices: HIGHEST ENRICHMENT: 80-100% success (tied with LinkedIn Sales Nav)
Unique buying intent signal: job postings indicate budget and growth
Perfect timing: companies actively scaling relevant functions
Match job search to your product (SDR jobs → sales tools, Data Engineer → data platforms)
Personalize outreach by referencing their hiring needs
Target hiring managers or department heads for that function

example_use_cases.intent_signal: Scaling sales team = need for sales tools
example_use_cases.message_hook: 'Saw you're hiring SDRs - we help teams like yours scale faster'

example_use_cases.target_contact: CTO, VP Engineering, Head of Data
example_use_cases.message_hook: 'Noticed you're expanding your data team - our platform helps...'

example_use_cases.intent_signal: Growing HR function = need for HR tools
example_use_cases.message_hook: 'Saw you're scaling your HR team - we streamline...'

when_to_use: Product/service directly relates to a specific job function
Want to target companies with proven budget (they're hiring)
Timing matters (reach out during growth phase)
Need strong personalization angle for outreach
when_not_to_use: Product doesn't relate to any specific job function
Targeting companies regardless of hiring status
Job postings don't indicate relevant buying intent
Need higher volume (job-based targeting = smaller lists)

common_issues.solution: Broaden search terms, remove location filters, search multiple related job titles
Use Google search or LinkedIn to find company websites
Add filters: company size, industry, location to refine results
Deduplicate by company name before enrichment, keep most senior job posting

messaging_templates: Subject: Saw you're hiring [Role] - here's how we can help
Value prop: 'As you scale [Department], [Your Product] helps teams like yours...'
CTA: 'Would love to show you how [Company] leveraged us during their growth phase'
